bioconda.name: stacks
bioconda.summary: Stacks is a software pipeline for building loci from short-read sequences.

biocontainers.name: stacks
biocontainers.summary: Developed to work with restriction enzyme based sequence data, such as radseq, for building genetic maps and conducting population genomics and phylogeography analysis.

biotools.summary: Developed to work with restriction enzyme based sequence data, such as RADseq, for building genetic maps and conducting population genomics and phylogeography analysis.

bioschemas.name: Stacks
bioschemas.summary: Developed to work with restriction enzyme based sequence data, such as RADseq, for building genetic maps and conducting population genomics and phylogeography analysis.

galaxy.summary: Stacks is a software pipeline for building loci from short-read sequences, such as RAD-seq
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Developed to work with restriction enzyme based sequence data, such as RADseq, for building genetic maps and conducting population genomics and phylogeography analysis.

related_workflows.name: Workflow Constructed From History 'STACKS RAD: Population Genomics With Reference Genome'
